dialogue.text: Oh Ben, I am sorry that I left in such a hurry, leaving behind such a mess. Must have looked like a crime scene, almost.
Don't worry, I actually cleaned up a bit for you after hearing you went to the hospital.
Thank you, though you didn't have to.
It's a janitor's job to keep the building pristine and clean after all.
Are those bars in front of the window? Are those new... Ben?
This might be our last chance to get to know each other, I saw the paperwork of you leaving the apartment soon. We can't have this. Not yet.
Hold on, we can just talk this out, right?
Not before I show you how much I love you.
U-Uh... please put down the knife...
It's just how I love people...
